content.prompt: The foreign policy ideas in the excerpt are best explained by which of the following nineteenth-century developments?

choices.label: A response to changing immigration patterns
An attempt to end Reconstruction policies
A reaction to expanding United States economic activity
An effort to enact political reforms in urban areas

topic.text: 6.12: Controversies over the Role of Government in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
